turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Want to order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want four medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One Hawaiian, one chicken barbecue, one with extra pepperoni, and one with aloes green peppers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I want all of them with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note bella luna charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok you have ordered 4 medium pizzas with extra cheese, 1 hawaiin, 1 chicken bbq, 1 extra pepperoni, 1 olives and green peppers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $80, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pick up, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all I needed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Will do.
